q_and_a_content.title: Closed Beta Starting Soon
q_and_a_content.description: The Rickware - Labs Closed Beta is launching soon! Only selected users will receive access to the closed beta. As a reward for participating, every accepted beta tester will receive a permanent Unlock All account — granting full and unlimited access to all tools & software offered by Rickware - Labs, forever.
q_and_a_content.author: Rickware - Labs  -  (.rick.c137)

q_and_a_content.title: Quantum Hub joins as official Partner
q_and_a_content.description: We are excited to welcome Quantum Hub to the Rickware partner network. They bring premium tools and resources for the community. Check them out in the Partner tab.
q_and_a_content.author: Rickware - Labs  -  (.rick.c137)

q_and_a_content.title: ByteBunny Discord Self-Bot joins as official Partner
q_and_a_content.description: We are proud to welcome ByteBunny Discord Self-Bot to the Rickware partner network. A powerful tool for Discord automation, now officially part of our growing partner ecosystem. Check them out in the Partner tab.
q_and_a_content.author: Rickware - Labs  -  (.rick.c137)

q_and_a_content.title: Discord Server is finished
q_and_a_content.description: Our Discord community Server is finished! The server comes fully equipped with a complete infrastructure: ticket system, XP system, a custom in-server bank system, captcha verify system, customer ratings system, and our own Rickware - Labs AI support directly available inside Discord server tickets.
q_and_a_content.author: Rickware - Labs  -  (.rick.c137)

q_and_a_content.title: New payment methods coming soon
q_and_a_content.description: We are working on adding additional payment methods including crypto payments and PayPal. Expected rollout is within the next 30 days. Stay tuned for more details.
q_and_a_content.author: Rickware - Labs  -  (.rick.c137)

q_and_a_content.title: New & More Tools coming soon
q_and_a_content.description: Many existing tools are currently being completely recoded from the ground up to ensure cross-platform and launcher compatibility, maximum user-friendliness, performance improvements, feature enhancements, new functionalities, and a full overhaul of all graphical user interfaces (GUIs). This requires a significant amount of work alongside the continued development of brand new tools — we appreciate your patience.
q_and_a_content.author: Rickware - Labs  -  (.rick.c137)

q_and_a_content.title: Scheduled Maintenance — Mar 22, 02:00 MEZ
q_and_a_content.description: We will be performing scheduled server maintenance on March 22nd from 02:00 to 04:00 MEZ. During this window, the launcher and API may be temporarily unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience.
q_and_a_content.author: Rickware - Labs  -  (.rick.c137)
